translations: n.[生化]硫胺素（维生素 B1，等于 thiamin）

sentences.sentence: Thiamine is the vitamin that started it all.
sentences.translation: 作为vitamin家族的一个成员，硫胺揭开了整个家族的故事。

sentences.sentence: As its name implies, thiamine is part of a group of chemicals known as amines.
sentences.translation: 正如它名称所显示的那样，硫胺属于一种叫做胺(amines)的化学物质。

sentences.sentence: Also, these whole grain foods contain a lot of vitamin B6, which is full of thiamine.
sentences.translation: 此外，这些全谷物食品当中也含有大量的维生素b6(富含硫胺素)。
